PackageOracle.name: DA_PARTY_PREFERENCE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_PARTY_PREFERENCE
/* Generated on 01-JUL-15 01.12.00.812316000 AM -05:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,preference_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,preference_value IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,preference_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_party_preference;

body.name: DA_PARTY_PREFERENCE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_PARTY_PREFERENCE
/* Generated on 01-JUL-15 01.12.00.836691000 AM -05:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,preference_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,preference_value IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_party_preference.add, parms=' || party_id || '|' || preference_type_cd || '|' || preference_value || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_party_preference a
(
a.party_id
,a.preference_type_cd
,a.preference_value
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.party_id
,add.preference_type_cd
,add.preference_value
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_party_preference.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,preference_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_party_preference.del, parms=' || party_id || '|' || preference_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_party_preference a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.party_id = del.party_id
AND a.preference_type_cd = del.preference_type_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_party_preference.del');

END del;

END da_party_preference;
